title: ISic000904. I.Sicily inscription 000904
body:
Facsimile Images

[Βικ]τωρῖνος
[ἐ]νθάδε κε-
[ῖτε τό]πος εἴδιος
((⳨)) ((⸙)) ((⳨))

Apparatus criticus

Text of Orsi ; The second staurogram is reported by Orsi as simply Ρ

English translation

Biktorinos lies here, his own resting place ((staurogram)) ((palm)) ((staurogram))

commentary
